attributes.name: Fleshripping Repeater
attributes.description: "A shot to your enemies gut is guaranteed to rip through their entrails and come out the other side."
attributes.parsed_description: "A shot to your enemies gut is guaranteed to rip through their entrails and come out the other side."

attributes.name: Fleshsplicer's Rapier
attributes.description: "Cut the flesh from your foes and forge them anew."
attributes.parsed_description: "Cut the flesh from your foes and forge them anew."

attributes.name: Fleshsticker
attributes.description: "Oww."
attributes.parsed_description: "Oww."

attributes.name: Fleshwoven Staff
attributes.description: "Seams of human flesh crudely stitched together adorn the shaft of this staff. Disgusting."
attributes.parsed_description: "Seams of human flesh crudely stitched together adorn the shaft of this staff. Disgusting."

attributes.name: Fleshwrapped Hatchet
attributes.description: “The handle is clearly wrapped in human flesh. The tension on the flesh makes you think it may not be that old...”
attributes.parsed_description: “The handle is clearly wrapped in human flesh. The tension on the flesh makes you think it may not be that old...”

attributes.name: Flint Logging Axe
attributes.description: 1-Handed. A makeshift but functional Logging Axe. Used to gather trees, albeit slowly.
attributes.parsed_description: 1-Handed. A makeshift but functional Logging Axe. Used to gather trees, albeit slowly.

attributes.name: Flint Spear
attributes.description: 2-Handed. A Spear with a Flint head. Favors Dexterity for dealing damage, but Strength also contributes. Can be thrown.
attributes.parsed_description: 2-Handed. A Spear with a Flint head. Favors Dexterity for dealing damage, but Strength also contributes. Can be thrown.

attributes.name: Flowing Life
attributes.description: "My magic shall flow through you."
attributes.parsed_description: "My magic shall flow through you."

attributes.name: Flutter
attributes.description: “Light was her step and quick was her blade. Like bird on the wind her opponent dismayed.”
attributes.parsed_description: “Light was her step and quick was her blade. Like bird on the wind her opponent dismayed.”

attributes.name: Folly of Man
attributes.description: "Man's greatest lie is convincing himself he is powerful."
attributes.parsed_description: "Man's greatest lie is convincing himself he is powerful."

attributes.name: Footman's Royal Pike
attributes.description: "A standard issue pike for the royal guard, the craftsmanship of this weapon is immaculate."
attributes.parsed_description: "A standard issue pike for the royal guard, the craftsmanship of this weapon is immaculate."

attributes.name: Forced Heir
attributes.description: "Being fourth in line for the throne means you will likely never wear the crown. Taking the line of succession into your own hands yields more consistent results."
attributes.parsed_description: "Being fourth in line for the throne means you will likely never wear the crown. Taking the line of succession into your own hands yields more consistent results."

attributes.name: Forceful Rebuke
attributes.description: "She spat the words at him as though they tasted bad."
attributes.parsed_description: "She spat the words at him as though they tasted bad."

attributes.name: Force of Fire
attributes.description: “Nothing is safe from the flame. It spreads viciously, lighting all in its path ablaze.”
attributes.parsed_description: “Nothing is safe from the flame. It spreads viciously, lighting all in its path ablaze.”

attributes.name: Force of Frost
attributes.description: "The cold conquers all. Fires are extinguished, blood freezes, death comes."
attributes.parsed_description: "The cold conquers all. Fires are extinguished, blood freezes, death comes."

attributes.name: Force of Nature
attributes.description: "Just like Fungalstep, this war hammer is a force unto itself."
attributes.parsed_description: "Just like Fungalstep, this war hammer is a force unto itself."

attributes.name: Foresight of the Elders
attributes.description: "They knew that their enemies would one day come for them. And so they prepared, forging weapons with which to defend themselves."
attributes.parsed_description: "They knew that their enemies would one day come for them. And so they prepared, forging weapons with which to defend themselves."

attributes.name: Forester's Pike
attributes.description: "Snap a Dryad in half, sharpen it to a point and you have made yourself a pike!"
attributes.parsed_description: "Snap a Dryad in half, sharpen it to a point and you have made yourself a pike!"

attributes.name: Forest Fire
attributes.description: "Let loose the spark that will engulf the forest."
attributes.parsed_description: "Let loose the spark that will engulf the forest."

attributes.name: Forest Ranger's Respite
attributes.description: "Sometimes arrows are just too much work."
attributes.parsed_description: "Sometimes arrows are just too much work."

attributes.name: Forest's Guide
attributes.description: "Keep the Dryads at an arms reach, for they are lethal creatures."
attributes.parsed_description: "Keep the Dryads at an arms reach, for they are lethal creatures."

attributes.name: Forestsong Musket
attributes.description: "Listen as my shot echoes throughout the forest. All shall know of my presence."
attributes.parsed_description: "Listen as my shot echoes throughout the forest. All shall know of my presence."

attributes.name: Forest's Whispesr
attributes.description: "Rangers traversed the forest keeping an ear to the ground, listening for who or what was nearby."
attributes.parsed_description: "Rangers traversed the forest keeping an ear to the ground, listening for who or what was nearby."

attributes.name: Foretold Fate
attributes.description: "I always knew this day would come."
attributes.parsed_description: "I always knew this day would come."

attributes.name: Forever Frost
attributes.description: "Venture far enough north and you will find the land of forever frost."
attributes.parsed_description: "Venture far enough north and you will find the land of forever frost."

attributes.name: Forever Mourning
attributes.description: "We've lost so many of our friends. How many more will we lose?"
attributes.parsed_description: "We've lost so many of our friends. How many more will we lose?"

attributes.name: Forgelighter
attributes.description: "Light the forges and build the weapons. Our assault begins at dawn."
attributes.parsed_description: "Light the forges and build the weapons. Our assault begins at dawn."

attributes.name: Forgotten Competition Rapier
attributes.description: "Dueling is a remarkably popular past time in Aeternum. One duelist was defeated so badly he left his settlement, leaving this rapier behind."
attributes.parsed_description: "Dueling is a remarkably popular past time in Aeternum. One duelist was defeated so badly he left his settlement, leaving this rapier behind."

attributes.name: Forgotten Experiment
attributes.description: "Of the many experiments left beind by the Ancients, this warhammer is one of the more peculiar ones. The hammer vibrates at all times, humming some strange song."
attributes.parsed_description: "Of the many experiments left beind by the Ancients, this warhammer is one of the more peculiar ones. The hammer vibrates at all times, humming some strange song."

attributes.name: Forgotten Flame
attributes.description: “The flame atop the staff has been burning for ages, a long forgotten remnant of some powerful mage.”
attributes.parsed_description: “The flame atop the staff has been burning for ages, a long forgotten remnant of some powerful mage.”

attributes.name: Forgotten Memory
attributes.description: "This worn blade has seen thousands of years pass and nearly as many wielders."
attributes.parsed_description: "This worn blade has seen thousands of years pass and nearly as many wielders."

attributes.name: Forgotten Ranger's Recurve
attributes.description: "The Soulwarden's sent her out into the corrupted frontier on a simple scouting mission. Her bow was found weeks later, but she never materialized."
attributes.parsed_description: "The Soulwarden's sent her out into the corrupted frontier on a simple scouting mission. Her bow was found weeks later, but she never materialized."

attributes.name: Forgotten Remnant
attributes.description: "Cast aside who or what you once were. You belong to Aeternum now."
attributes.parsed_description: "Cast aside who or what you once were. You belong to Aeternum now."

attributes.name: Forgotten Song
attributes.description: "The ghouls and gheists may have sang in life, but the only song they know now is their groans of agony."
attributes.parsed_description: "The ghouls and gheists may have sang in life, but the only song they know now is their groans of agony."

attributes.name: Forgotten Virtue
attributes.description: "Do not let this land rip from you who you are."
attributes.parsed_description: "Do not let this land rip from you who you are."

attributes.name: Forked Tongue
attributes.description: "Watch her words, for while they may ring true there is always a cost to them."
attributes.parsed_description: "Watch her words, for while they may ring true there is always a cost to them."

attributes.name: Fork Lightning
attributes.description: "Lightning cracks from the spear as it is thrown, jutting out in every direction."
attributes.parsed_description: "Lightning cracks from the spear as it is thrown, jutting out in every direction."

attributes.name: Formal Invitation
attributes.description: "You are cordially invited to 'Catch These Hands' tomorrow at 12 PM sharp."
attributes.parsed_description: "You are cordially invited to 'Catch These Hands' tomorrow at 12 PM sharp."

attributes.name: Formation of the Storm
attributes.description: "I urge you not to anger me lest you awake a power you do not understand."
attributes.parsed_description: "I urge you not to anger me lest you awake a power you do not understand."

attributes.name: Forsaken Bow
attributes.description: A weapon that seems to have been wielded by the Lost at some point in its history.
attributes.parsed_description: A weapon that seems to have been wielded by the Lost at some point in its history.
